title: Ground News - Cleanup begins as strong overnight storms leave thousands without power, downed trees and debris
text:
Summary by KHOU 11 Crews are working to re-establish power to thousands of customers in the Houston area following strong storms overnight. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
